column3: The browser from Mozilla - the not-for-profit working to give everyone more power online
A specially modified version of Firefox that does more to protect users' privacy using the TOR network
Another free and open-source web browser
A browser that doesn't treat you like a product
A freeware, cross-platform web browser with flexible customisation and control
"Explore the web the way it was meant to be"
Fast, free & open-source
The easiest to use privacy-conscious search engine
An open-source metasearch engine, which aggregates the results of other search engines without giving them users' information
Ecosia use the profit they make from user searches to plant trees all over the world
"The world's most private search engine"
Another privacy-focused search engine
Not-for-profit offering privacy-protected search
No user tracking and hosted in the UK's greenest data centre
A personal search engine that runs on your computer
Support the Sustainable Development Goals with your web searches
Totally private search with no tracking or storage of your searches or IP address
Powered by 100% green electricity and ad-free, Posteo costs €1 a month
Secure email service founded in the wake of the Snowden revelations - also available for €1 a month
The Mozilla Foundation's open-source email offering
A not-for-profit collective offering hosting to supporters of the environment and human rights
Secure email based in Switzerland
Tutanota claims to be the world's most secure email service
Private and secure email, calendars, and contacts
